description: This file defines an API route for searching music catalog tracks. It uses FastAPI to create an endpoint that performs a filtered search query on the track database, returning matching tracks with pagination. It relies on SQLAlchemy ORM models and schemas for input/output structure.

classes.name: CatalogSearchResponse
classes.description: Pydantic model defining the response structure for catalog search results, including list of items and total count.

methods.name: search_catalog( query: str = Query(..., description="Search query"), genre: Optional[str] = Query(default=None), artist: Optional[str] = Query(default=None), album: Optional[str] = Query(default=None), page: int = Query(default=1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(default=10, ge=1, le=100), db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(current_user), )
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests to perform a filtered search over tracks based on user query parameters. Returns a CatalogSearchResponse with a list of matching tracks and total count.

ctags.name: search_catalog
ctags.signature: ( query: str = Query(..., description="Search query"), genre: Optional[str] = Query(default=None), artist: Optional[str] = Query(default=None), album: Optional[str] = Query(default=None), page: int = Query(default=1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(default=10, ge=1, le=100), db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(current_user), )
